test_sum01.generated_summary: Customer’s orders shall be confirmed by the Seller in writing. The Contract shall become binding upon receipt of the Seller’s order confirmation and the delivery schedule shall become effective upon receipt of the down-payment.

test_sum010.generated_summary: Copying and/or reproducing and/or communication and/or transmission to a third party without the Seller’s written approval is strictly forbidden.

test_sum011.generated_summary: In no event shall the Parties be liable for any indirect consequential, incidental, special or punitive damages.

test_sum012.generated_summary: Partie may terminate all or part of the Contract for default of the other Party in the event that the other Party persistently fails to perform its obligations and despite the non-defaulting Party notifying by acknowledgment of receipt the defaulting Party to take appropriate corrective measures.

test_sum013.generated_summary: AH owns all foreground intellectual property and knowhow generated by the analysis of the data processed data and/or anonymous data.

test_sum014.generated_summary: The content and time schedule of the training courses shall be confirmed at the time of signature of the Contract.

test_sum015.generated_summary: Training means the helicopter, the tools, the simulator, the infrastructure and the equipment used by the Seller to perform the training services.

test_sum016.generated_summary: The Seller may cancel any training courses that does not meet the minimum enrolment quota defined in the Purchase Order. The Customer will be notified of the cancellation at least 30 days prior to the scheduled dates of the training session. If the failure to meet the minimum quota is not the fault of the Customer, the Seller may propose another training session or reimbursement of the payment already made.

test_sum017.generated_summary: The Customer is responsible for loss and damage to the Seller’s property and the Customer’s training means and personnel.

test_sum018.generated_summary: The Customer will be asked to fill in a sign and return site survey report for the Seller to assess if the training can be performed at the site selected by the Customer.

test_sum019.generated_summary: The Seller may perform the training services at its convenience notably regarding the use of the training means as long as the Training Objective and/or Regulation requirements are reached and the Price and/or Duration of the Training Services and/or Delivery date is not affected.

test_sum02.generated_summary: In case the Customer requires a quotation from the Seller, the Contract becomes binding when the Seller receives the Customer’s written approval.

test_sum020.generated_summary: The Customer agrees not to install or use the Software on any computer or other hardware other than those in which it was originally installed.

test_sum021.generated_summary: At the time of the signature of the Contract or at the latest ten days before flight training start, the Customer shall provide the Seller with a certificate of insurance containing this provision.

test_sum022.generated_summary: All Seller’s wet training session documentation and notes are provided in English unless otherwise agreed in the Contract.

test_sum023.generated_summary: Each Party remains solely and exclusively responsible for the Information Exchanged and shall take any appropriate action in order to comply with the applicable laws and regulations.

test_sum024.generated_summary: The Customer shall hold harmless the Seller from and against any third party claim based on breach of the above mentioned warranties or resulting from any other breach of this Contract.

test_sum025.generated_summary: The SaaS and/or DaaS is designed to perform the services and functions described in the Service or Product Specification available to the Customer by the Seller on request. In case of an error or defect, the Customer must provide all the necessary information and documentation in its possession to enable the Seller to investigate the error or defect. The Seller will remedy such error or defect by providing a correction release or by finding a reasonable workaround solution.

test_sum026.generated_summary: If the Technical Data is not provided by the Customer, the Seller may perform the R&O Service according to the Technical Data in force known by the Seller.

test_sum027.generated_summary: It is understood between the Parties that the Seller shall either carry out the R&O service in its own workshops or have such reconditioning carried out by Seller selected workshop.

test_sum028.generated_summary: The exchange part shall become the Customer’s property and the removed one shall become the Seller’s property. The Customer cannot request return of the removed part core unit.

test_sum029.generated_summary: On Customer’s request, the Seller is prepared to carry out an investigation on the Part. In this case, the Seller will charge the Customer for the costs incurred even if the Customer chooses not to have the work performed by the Seller. These costs will not be charged if the Part is covered by the Seller’s warranty.

test_sum03.generated_summary: Any changes or configuration changes requested by the Customer require prior mutual written agreement of the Parties.

test_sum030.generated_summary: The alleged failure must have occurred within the timelimits mentioned hereafter for any pre-owned Helicopter not sold in an as-is condition within 500 flying hours or 12 months after acceptance at the delivery location.

test_sum031.generated_summary: This training is granted personally and cannot be transferred or assigned.

test_sum032.generated_summary: The Customer shall bear the costs for ground and inflight risks incurred by its personnel and risks arising from the civil liability of its personnel.

test_sum033.generated_summary: Reasonable insurance coverage of risks arising from training will be included in the Seller’s insurance policy during training flights and technical training except in case of wilful misconduct or gross negligence of the Customer, the Seller shall effect and maintain an insurance coverage to cover all property damage to the Products, all damages, losses, injury or death of any person (including passengers) for the purpose of the training flights, except the personnel of the Customer and any loss or damage to any property.

test_sum034.generated_summary: For training planned with simulation, if flight simulator is not available or if simulator training is not in accordance with the regulations of the Customer’s national civil aviation authorities, simulator flight hours will be replaced by Helicopter flight hours for a specific duration.

test_sum035.generated_summary: Technical representatives fluent in English or French will remain subject to their national labour regulations. They will be available for 5 days per week without exceeding 830 hours per day and 4130 hours per week.

test_sum036.generated_summary: This onsite support shall be provided at the Customer’s choice either at the time of the first basic inspection or at any given time chosen by the Customer, but no later than 15 months after acceptance of the last Helicopter delivered under the Contract.

test_sum037.generated_summary: The Customer agrees to abide by the General Conditions of Use (GCU) of the SaaS. It must also ensure that all SaaS users comply with the relevant GCU.

test_sum038.generated_summary: Unless otherwise specified, Customer’s authorization shall be assumed as given for necessary maintenance or other necessary tests flights and ground runs.

test_sum039.generated_summary: If the Seller needs to send the BFE/CFE Parts to the original equipment manufacturer, this shall be charged to the Customer.

test_sum04.generated_summary: When French law is applicable, the Customer is liable to the Seller for a fixed amount of 40 euros for cost recovery fees. If the actual costs incurred by the Seller in recovering unpaid sums exceed 40 euros, the Seller may ask for additional compensation upon producing evidence of such costs.

test_sum040.generated_summary: The Helicopter must be handed over at the Seller’s or subcontractor’s facilities in airworthiness condition with updated documentation and flight manual in English and all components in serviceable condition.

test_sum041.generated_summary: In the event of any conflict between the following documents, the following order of precedence shall apply.

test_sum042.generated_summary: Supplier shall verify, guarantee and certify compliance of its Products and Services with all applicable industry standards and regulations in effect.

test_sum043.generated_summary: The Parties shall comply without diversion with the United States of America, the European Union and any applicable national export control sanctions and embargoes.

test_sum044.generated_summary: Prior to the purchase order signature date, the Supplier shall identify the Export Regulations applicable to the Products and/ or Services and the Export Control Classification and subsequently notify during the Purchase Order duration in writing using the form provided by the Purchaser.

test_sum045.generated_summary: The Supplier represents that at the date of signature of the Purchase Order, it is not subject to any sanctions lists or located in a comprehensive embargoed country according to Export Regulations.

test_sum046.generated_summary: The obligations relating to confidentiality remain in force and effect for the duration of any purchase order and continue for a period of 20 years from the date of expiry or termination of the purchase order or as long as one Helicopter remains in service whichever is the longer.

test_sum047.generated_summary: The Parties confirm and agree that any personal data exchanged in connection with the purchase order has been collected and will be exchanged in compliance with the applicable personal data protection laws and regulations.

test_sum048.generated_summary: Supplier shall give notice immediately to the Purchaser of any investigation or legal proceeding initiated against the Supplier by any public authority relating to an alleged violation of applicable laws and regulations.

test_sum049.generated_summary: Any dispute that the Parties fail to resolve amicably within period of 3 months shall be brought exclusively before the courts of Paris.

test_sum050.generated_summary: This loan agreement cannot be amended except by a specific agreement in writing signed by duly authorized representatives of the Parties.

test_sum06.generated_summary: Transfer of ownership of the Product is subject to the prior fulfilment by the Customer of its obligations.

test_sum07.generated_summary: From the transfer of ownership to the Customer, the Customer shall effect and maintain an appropriate insurance coverage. The Customer shall waive all rights of subrogation against the Seller, its assignees, agents and employees.

test_sum08.generated_summary: From the transfer of risks, the Customer shall bear all risks related to the Helicopter and waive the right to recourse against the Seller, its assignees, its directors, agents and employees.
